row.process: ! --------------------------------------------- :SET &CSV_JN# = '' :SET &GEN_BESCHREIBUNG# = 'BBSEreignisRente_Loga_Gener' :SET &PROGRAM# = '&PROG_LC#' :SET &INIFILE# = '&PROGRAM#.ini' :SET &OPTIONS# = '&INIFILE#' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&GEN_BESCHREIBUNG#.log' :SET &LOGA_OPT# = 'J' ! --------------------------------------------- :IF &VTRFILE# <> "" : SET &CSV_JN# = 'J' : SET &WORKVTRFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/&VTRFILE#' echo "verschiebe VTRFILE von INPUT nach WORK" mv -v "&INDIR#/&VTRFILE#" "&WORKVTRFILE#" :ELSE : SET &CSV_JN# = 'N' : SET &WORKVTRFILE# = '' :ENDIF ! --------------------------------------------- cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE# VALUTA = &VALUTA# MANDANT = &MANDANTEN# VTRNR_VON = &AB_VTR_NR# VTRNR_BIS = &BIS_VTR_NR# VTRFILE = &WORKVTRFILE# TRACE = &TRACE# PROT_VTR_FILTER = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN# PROT_MSG_TYPE = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN# CSV_JN = &CSV_JN# BESCHREIBUNG = &GEN_BESCHREIBUNG# LOGFILE = &LOGFILE# LOGA = &LOGA_OPT# __EOF__ ! --------------------------------------------- :IF &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = "J" echo 'Test &PROGRAM# &TS#' > &WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#_1.out :ENDIF ! --------------------------------------------- !starten Anwendung :INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB ! ---------------------------------------------
